Name: Squatting female figure
Description: Female figurine in Greek style, showing a naked woman with legs splayed, and intricate hairdo, in the manner of Aphrodite, Greek goddess of love, from the city of Naukratis in the Western Delta. The city was a unique Greek colony installed with the permission of the Egyptian kings in the 26th Dynasty, to channel the trade between the Nile valley and the Aegean.
